Trivial Metafunctions Summary

In the following table, x is an arbitrary class type.

Metafunction Header
first<x>::type #include <boost/mpl/pair.hpp>
second<x>::type #include <boost/mpl/pair.hpp>
base<x>::type #include <boost/mpl/base.hpp>
